entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
